newsitem.title: GERMANY: Ifo details business climate data since Jan 1996.
newsitem.headline: Ifo details business climate data since Jan 1996.

text.p: The German Ifo economics institute released its business climate data for the first time on a new balanced basis in February. The table below contains the figures showing balance of change since January 1996.
W. German Ifo business climate figures on balance
E. German Ifo business climate figures on balance
NOTE: Ifo data was released for the first time on a new balanced basis, which the institute believes better reflects business confidence after unification.
The figures reflect a change from month-ago numbers rather than giving an index value compared with the base year of 1991.
East and west figures had drifted apart after the eastern post-unification upswing and the western state's recession.
Figures could range between extremes of plus and minus 100 points. A positive figure represents an improvement from the previous month, a negative figure represents a deterioration.
The final figure is calculated by balancing out positive and negative comments from firms, ignoring the neutral assessments.
